meanings.sent1: The astomatal leaves do not have tiny openings for breathing.
meanings.sent2: Plants with astomatal surfaces may have different ways of exchanging gases.
meanings.sent3: The astomatal plant felt left out during the photosynthesis party.
meanings.sent4: Her astomatal skin seemed impenetrable to the harsh sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The astomatal nature of the desert plant made it resilient to drought.

meanings.sent1: An astomatal leaf may have a unique way of regulating moisture.
meanings.sent2: The astomatal surface of the leaf puzzled the botanist.
meanings.sent3: The astomatal plant was the envy of its stomata-bearing neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The astomatal barrier protected the plant from excessive water loss.
meanings.sent5: The astomatal characteristic of the cactus helped it thrive in arid conditions.
